title: (x) Need Font ID / Wide sans caps - Good Times Heavy {John L}
content:
Can anyone ID this font:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100215100514im_/http:/typophile.com/files/vvfont_5744.jpg)

Thanks!
author: webdizzy

comments.content: It looks like [Good Times Heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20100215100514/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/good-times/heavy/) by Ray Larabie, but the R us customized.
I think you're right! I knew it looked familiar! Thanks for the help!!!
